job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Title: Site Reliability Engineer

Remote role (Anywhere in the US)

Full-time


Key Skills - Cloud Deployment, Agile, Kubernetes, Opensource, Python, and Elastic Search


Your Past Experience & Future Success

5 to 10 years supporting large scale, distributed installations

Experience operating service in the cloud

Exposure to and experience with the following tools Ansible, Docker, Kubernetes, Python, Terraform / Terragrunt

Participating in and contributing to agile methodologies and best practices

Articulate and personable with strong spoken and written language abilities.

You engender a sense of mentoring and knowledge sharing amongst your team, hence creating a synergistic learning environment.

Experience working and collaborate with a distributed SRE and Engineering team

Self-motivated and sensitive about on-time delivery

Jenkins and CI/CD pipeline

Apache Cassandra, Apache Kafka

Open Source Software Development

ElasticSearch / OpenDistro / OpenSearch

HashiCorp Vault
